edus: Write to the Tax Credit Office to register as an ‘ intermediary organisation ’
if you work in the voluntary sector and act for many people .

Write to the Tax Credit Office to register as an ‘intermediary organisation’ if you work in the voluntary sector and act for many people.

a91d169bb9870b2578f96dc2a15bdee6044ce9f4.title: ## Other payments and services
edus: If you have a lot of medical costs ,
you can claim your Medicare benefits
without having to call or visit us .
Find out about Medicare claiming .
a91d169bb9870b2578f96dc2a15bdee6044ce9f4.snippet:
## Other payments and services

If you have a lot of medical costs, you can claim your Medicare benefits without having to call or visit us. Find out about Medicare claiming.

66aa2dfb5e13b5e66563a3342cf4ff362b0da217.title: ## Forms available for upload
edus: Forms
you can upload
have the notice 'This form
can be uploaded through HPOS ' .
You 'll get a message
if you send a form
that ca n't be uploaded .
66aa2dfb5e13b5e66563a3342cf4ff362b0da217.snippet:
## Forms available for upload

Forms you can upload have the notice 'This form can be uploaded through HPOS'. You'll get a message if you send a form that can't be uploaded.
clauses: Forms you can upload have the notice 'This form can be uploaded through HPOS'.
You'll get a message if you send a form that can't be uploaded.

7b4b41aee46cbc59b2c3f1ae93bda0a471bf70c5.title: ## You’re single or divorced
edus: If you ’ re single ,
divorced or your civil partnership was dissolved
and you die
after you ’ ve reached State Pension age ,
your estate can claim up to 3 months of your basic State Pension .
They can only do this
if you hadn ’ t claimed it .
7b4b41aee46cbc59b2c3f1ae93bda0a471bf70c5.snippet:
## You’re single or divorced

If you’re single, divorced or your civil partnership was dissolved and you die after you’ve reached State Pension age, your estate can claim up to 3 months of your basic State Pension. They can only do this if you hadn’t claimed it.
clauses: If you’re single, divorced or your civil partnership was dissolved and you die after you’ve reached State Pension age, your estate can claim up to 3 months of your basic State Pension.
They can only do this if you hadn’t claimed it.

85ca070d81dcbed3920aecc2ed4eca2c0c57f5af.title: ## Extra money from deferring your State Pension
edus: If you decided to defer your State Pension
and built up an extra amount ,
your spouse or civil partner may either claim the extra State Pension or get a lump sum .
Provided they haven ’ t remarried or formed a new civil partnership
since your death
they can get this
when they reach State Pension age .
85ca070d81dcbed3920aecc2ed4eca2c0c57f5af.snippet:
## Extra money from deferring your State Pension

If you decided to defer your State Pension and built up an extra amount, your spouse or civil partner may either claim the extra State Pension or get a lump sum. Provided they haven’t remarried or formed a new civil partnership since your death they can get this when they reach State Pension age.
clauses: If you decided to defer your State Pension and built up an extra amount, your spouse or civil partner may either claim the extra State Pension or get a lump sum.
Provided they haven’t remarried or formed a new civil partnership since your death they can get this when they reach State Pension age.

8910894704c8f4763519b6d4dcb6606da09cc79b.title: # Tax Relief in Disaster Situations
edus: IRS is providing a variety of tax relief for those
affected by Hurricanes Irma and Maria .
8910894704c8f4763519b6d4dcb6606da09cc79b.snippet:
# Tax Relief in Disaster Situations

IRS is providing a variety of tax relief for those affected by Hurricanes Irma and Maria.
clauses: IRS is providing a variety of tax relief for those affected by Hurricanes Irma and Maria.

6de20194ab323890c078be39594a06a1e4e68db8.title: ## General Program Requirements
edus: In order to qualify for this benefit program ,
you must be a Native American/American Indian
who has been accepted or enrolled in an accredited degree program , college or university
to study in the field of health care ,
and you or your family member must be enrolled in a federally recognized American Indian tribe or Alaska Native village .
6de20194ab323890c078be39594a06a1e4e68db8.snippet:
## General Program Requirements

In order to qualify for this benefit program, you must be a Native American/American Indian who has been accepted or enrolled in an accredited degree program, college or university to study in the field of health care, and you or your family member must be enrolled in a federally recognized American Indian tribe or Alaska Native village.
clauses: In order to qualify for this benefit program, you must be a Native American/American Indian who has been accepted or enrolled in an accredited degree program, college or university to study in the field of health care, and you or your family member must be enrolled in a federally recognized American Indian tribe or Alaska Native village.

860c8f7cadd849e8d263ecba19f76c4af440b88c.title: ## Statutory Maternity Pay
clauses: You can still get Statutory Maternity Leave and SMP if your baby:
* is born early
* is stillborn after the start of your 24th week of pregnancy
* dies after being born
860c8f7cadd849e8d263ecba19f76c4af440b88c.snippet:
## Statutory Maternity Pay

You can still get Statutory Maternity Leave and SMP if your baby:

* is born early
* is stillborn after the start of your 24th week of pregnancy
* dies after being born

if you go abroad for a short period ,
for example on holiday or for medical treatment .

#  2. Going abroad

You may still qualify for tax credits if you go abroad for a short period, for example on holiday or for medical treatment.

abcc4e0c73a48667dfc9c3735f44a0946af673a2.title: ## Other payments and services
edus: You can access information , support and short term counselling .
If you ’ re going through a difficult time ,
find out more about our social work services .

You can access information, support and short term counselling. If you’re going through a difficult time, find out more about our social work services.

431941c0ec688baea67e3b36ac0a0ba78b338628.title: ## If you act for a lot of clients
edus: You can get urgent authorisation online
if you ’ re an intermediary organisation
and you have a completed TC689 .
431941c0ec688baea67e3b36ac0a0ba78b338628.snippet:
## If you act for a lot of clients

You can get urgent authorisation online if you’re an intermediary organisation and you have a completed TC689.

3b64cdc91ab7a9a4317c7dd588615f833e4ca6aa.title: ## Getting paid instead of taking holidays
edus: The only time someone can get paid in place
of taking statutory leave
( known as ‘ payment in lieu ’ )
is
when they leave their job .
Employers must pay for untaken statutory leave
( even if the worker is dismissed for gross misconduct ) .
3b64cdc91ab7a9a4317c7dd588615f833e4ca6aa.snippet:
## Getting paid instead of taking holidays

The only time someone can get paid in place of taking statutory leave (known as ‘payment in lieu’) is when they leave their job. Employers must pay for untaken statutory leave (even if the worker is dismissed for gross misconduct).
clauses: The only time someone can get paid in place of taking statutory leave (known as ‘payment in lieu’) is when they leave their job.
Employers must pay for untaken statutory leave (even if the worker is dismissed for gross misconduct).

b7cf719d78a47a7a2613fe4dc23b6221d0af64cc.title: ## Statutory Maternity Leave
clauses: You qualify for Statutory Maternity Leave if:
* you’re an employee not a ‘worker’
* you give your employer the correct notice
b7cf719d78a47a7a2613fe4dc23b6221d0af64cc.snippet:
## Statutory Maternity Leave

You qualify for Statutory Maternity Leave if:

* you’re an employee not a ‘worker’
* you give your employer the correct notice

2c7c37769eb365976fb91d3888ae8eaac206e47d.title: ## Statutory Maternity Pay
clauses: To qualify for SMP you must:
* earn on average at least £113 a week
* give the correct notice
* give proof you’re pregnant
* have worked for your employer continuously for at least 26 weeks continuing into the ‘qualifying week’ - the 15th week before the expected week of childbirth
2c7c37769eb365976fb91d3888ae8eaac206e47d.snippet:
## Statutory Maternity Pay

To qualify for SMP you must:

* earn on average at least £113 a week
* give the correct notice
* give proof you’re pregnant
* have worked for your employer continuously for at least 26 weeks continuing into the ‘qualifying week’ - the 15th week before the expected week of childbirth

edus: Disaster survivors must repay SBA disaster loans .
SBA can only approve loans to applicants with a reasonable ability
to repay the loan and other obligations from earnings .
The terms of each loan are established in accordance with each borrower 's ability
to repay .
The law gives SBA several powerful tools
to make disaster loans affordable :
low fixed interest rates , long-terms
( up to 30 years ) ,
and refinancing of prior real estate liens
( in some cases ) .
As
required by law ,
the interest rate for each loan is based on SBA 's determination
of whether an applicant has the ability
to borrow or use their own resources
to overcome the disaster .
54879c752f337f93735b3d61294fbe982b6dd9e5.snippet: Disaster survivors must repay SBA disaster loans. SBA can only approve loans to applicants with a reasonable ability to repay the loan and other obligations from earnings. The terms of each loan are established in accordance with each borrower's ability to repay. The law gives SBA several powerful tools to make disaster loans affordable: low fixed interest rates, long-terms (up to 30 years), and refinancing of prior real estate liens (in some cases). As required by law, the interest rate for each loan is based on SBA's determination of whether an applicant has the ability to borrow or use their own resources to overcome the disaster.
clauses: Disaster survivors must repay SBA disaster loans.
SBA can only approve loans to applicants with a reasonable ability to repay the loan and other obligations from earnings.
The terms of each loan are established in accordance with each borrower's ability to repay.
The law gives SBA several powerful tools to make disaster loans affordable: low fixed interest rates, long-terms (up to 30 years), and refinancing of prior real estate liens (in some cases).
As required by law, the interest rate for each loan is based on SBA's determination of whether an applicant has the ability to borrow or use their own resources to overcome the disaster.

edus: The Department of Veteran Affairs
( VA )
Children of Women Vietnam Veterans
( CWVV )
Health Care Benefits Program provides reimbursement for medical care
related to covered birth defects and conditions
associated with a covered birth defect except for Spina Bifida .
CWVV is administered by the Chief Business Office Purchased Care located in Denver , Colorado .
4c651a9d6a04b0b2a571e2ab5ee408ffc51cbb65.snippet: The Department of Veteran Affairs (VA) Children of Women Vietnam Veterans (CWVV) Health Care Benefits Program provides reimbursement for medical care related to covered birth defects and conditions associated with a covered birth defect except for Spina Bifida. CWVV is administered by the Chief Business Office Purchased Care located in Denver, Colorado.
clauses: The Department of Veteran Affairs (VA) Children of Women Vietnam Veterans (CWVV) Health Care Benefits Program provides reimbursement for medical care related to covered birth defects and conditions associated with a covered birth defect except for Spina Bifida.
CWVV is administered by the Chief Business Office Purchased Care located in Denver, Colorado.
Consumption; transfer.
Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, a person may not:

* Consume retail marijuana or retail marijuana products in a retail marijuana establishment. A retail marijuana establishment may not allow retail marijuana or retail marijuana products to be consumed upon its licensed premises; or [IB 2015, c. 5, §1 (NEW).]
0e6ccca5019241fbcc5aa1154498afb00c685e04.snippet:
1. Consumption; transfer.  Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, a person may not:
* Consume retail marijuana or retail marijuana products in a retail marijuana establishment. A retail marijuana establishment may not allow retail marijuana or retail marijuana products to be consumed upon its licensed premises; or [IB 2015, c. 5, §1 (NEW).]

f7143450e9cd963d4a904fc2271bc7c79ee3861c.title: #  6. Inheritance

383e069af14576defd006b051b347be9ad0196ad.title: ## Items that qualify for the zero rate
clauses: You may be able to apply zero VAT when you sell the following to an eligible charity:
* equipment for making ‘talking’ books and newspapers
* lifeboats and associated equipment, including fuel
* medicine or ingredients for medicine
* resuscitation training models
383e069af14576defd006b051b347be9ad0196ad.snippet:
## Items that qualify for the zero rate

You may be able to apply zero VAT when you sell the following to an eligible charity:

* equipment for making ‘talking’ books and newspapers
* lifeboats and associated equipment, including fuel
* medicine or ingredients for medicine
* resuscitation training models

caafba2e62744a7893ad0f4147c4dc5a7b41582a.title: ## Get authorised
edus: Send form TC689 to the Tax Credit Office .
This must be signed by the person
( or persons
if it ’ s a joint claim )
you ’ re representing .
caafba2e62744a7893ad0f4147c4dc5a7b41582a.snippet:
## Get authorised

Send form TC689 to the Tax Credit Office. This must be signed by the person (or persons if it’s a joint claim) you’re representing.
clauses: Send form TC689 to the Tax Credit Office.
This must be signed by the person (or persons if it’s a joint claim) you’re representing.

edus: In order to qualify for this benefit program ,
homeowners and renters must have sustained physical damage
and be located in a disaster
declared county .
45c0b83ec88820c3c9c4a8d3b94d1051fce9e3ec.snippet: In order to qualify for this benefit program, homeowners and renters must have sustained physical damage and be located in a disaster declared county.
clauses: In order to qualify for this benefit program, homeowners and renters must have sustained physical damage and be located in a disaster declared county.

007882a2e9e87bb82534159e5392b1551adb8a78.title: # Advance Parole
edus: Advance parole allows you to travel back to the United States
without applying for a visa .
A transportation company
( airlines )
can accept an advance parole document
instead of a visa as proof
that you are authorized to travel to the United States .
An advance parole document does not replace your passport .
007882a2e9e87bb82534159e5392b1551adb8a78.snippet:
# Advance Parole

Advance parole allows you to travel back to the United States without applying for a visa. A transportation company (airlines) can accept an advance parole document instead of a visa as proof that you are authorized to travel to the United States. An advance parole document does not replace your passport.
clauses: Advance parole allows you to travel back to the United States without applying for a visa.
A transportation company (airlines) can accept an advance parole document instead of a visa as proof that you are authorized to travel to the United States.
An advance parole document does not replace your passport.

edus: VA can also reimburse expenses for covered travel to and from your doctor or health care facility within a reasonable commuting area .
Preauthorization is required for travel outside of the commuting area .
fe7cea1b36389206251af289a647ab7b51f61927.snippet: VA can also reimburse expenses for covered travel to and from your doctor or health care facility within a reasonable commuting area. Preauthorization is required for travel outside of the commuting area.
clauses: VA can also reimburse expenses for covered travel to and from your doctor or health care facility within a reasonable commuting area.
Preauthorization is required for travel outside of the commuting area.

fceef89770e5a406195680a80f873d8256441a00.title: #  2. Going abroad
clauses: If your trip is going to last longer than 8 or 12 weeks, contact the Tax Credit Office within a month.
Your tax credits will end unless:
* you get UK benefits or State Pension and you live in another European country with a child
* you work and pay National Insurance contributions in the UK, but your family lives in another European country
fceef89770e5a406195680a80f873d8256441a00.snippet:
#  2. Going abroad

If your trip is going to last longer than 8 or 12 weeks, contact the Tax Credit Office within a month. Your tax credits will end unless:

* you get UK benefits or State Pension and you live in another European country with a child
* you work and pay National Insurance contributions in the UK, but your family lives in another European country

edus: The U.S. Small Business Administration
( SBA )
is responsible for providing affordable , timely and accessible financial assistance to homeowners and renters
located in a declared disaster area .
Financial assistance is available in the form of low-interest , long-term loans for losses
that are not fully covered by insurance or other recoveries .
a966e2f34189a612a118f5435de98eb3581e63fe.snippet: The U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA) is responsible for providing affordable, timely and accessible financial assistance to homeowners and renters located in a declared disaster area. Financial assistance is available in the form of low-interest, long-term loans for losses that are not fully covered by insurance or other recoveries.
clauses: The U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA) is responsible for providing affordable, timely and accessible financial assistance to homeowners and renters located in a declared disaster area.
Financial assistance is available in the form of low-interest, long-term loans for losses that are not fully covered by insurance or other recoveries.

595e036edd3a98a99e4cb8762b06e2e1e4ecfd7a.title: ## Statutory Maternity Leave
edus: You can ’ t get Statutory Maternity Leave
if you have a child through surrogacy -
you could get Statutory Adoption Leave and Pay instead .
595e036edd3a98a99e4cb8762b06e2e1e4ecfd7a.snippet:
## Statutory Maternity Leave

You can’t get Statutory Maternity Leave if you have a child through surrogacy - you could get Statutory Adoption Leave and Pay instead.
clauses: You can’t get Statutory Maternity Leave if you have a child through surrogacy - you could get Statutory Adoption Leave and Pay instead.

78419407693d3d281ec422bce49eb96f02f3c017.title: ## Get authorised
edus: Tax credits will not be paid into your account
unless you ’ re the appointee .

## Get authorised

Tax credits will not be paid into your account unless you’re the appointee.
clauses: Tax credits will not be paid into your account unless you’re the appointee.

566837f88b9807265aac87e768200b3ba7b63c4a.title: ## What you’ll need
clauses: You’ll need accurate information about your:
* savings
* income, including your partner’s (from payslips, for example)
* existing benefits and pensions (including anyone living with you)
* outgoings (such as rent, mortgage, childcare payments)
566837f88b9807265aac87e768200b3ba7b63c4a.snippet:
## What you’ll need

You’ll need accurate information about your:

* savings
* income, including your partner’s (from payslips, for example)
* existing benefits and pensions (including anyone living with you)
* outgoings (such as rent, mortgage, childcare payments)

e2fd0f29623cd93fcfba178a111e05469c84ccc8.title: ## Double tax
edus: If you live in a country
without a ‘ double taxation agreement ’ with the UK ,
you might have to pay tax in both countries .
e2fd0f29623cd93fcfba178a111e05469c84ccc8.snippet:
## Double tax

If you live in a country without a ‘double taxation agreement’ with the UK, you might have to pay tax in both countries.
clauses: If you live in a country without a ‘double taxation agreement’ with the UK, you might have to pay tax in both countries.

edus: The SBA can provide up to $ 200,000
to homeowners to repair
or replace their primary residence .
Homeowners and renters are eligible for up to $ 40,000
to help repair
or replace personal property .
There are no upfront fees or early payment penalties
charged by SBA .
9c491aca227f1bd616340785208918e2afd117a2.snippet: The SBA can provide up to $200,000 to homeowners to repair or replace their primary residence. Homeowners and renters are eligible for up to $40,000 to help repair or replace personal property. There are no upfront fees or early payment penalties charged by SBA.
clauses: The SBA can provide up to $200,000 to homeowners to repair or replace their primary residence.
Homeowners and renters are eligible for up to $40,000 to help repair or replace personal property.
There are no upfront fees or early payment penalties charged by SBA.

de4e2be4ef3d3ed7a9559646c3b8e997ed1c514a.title: ## Statutory Maternity Pay
edus: You can ’ t get SMP
if you go into police custody during your maternity pay period .
It won ’ t restart
when you ’ re discharged .
de4e2be4ef3d3ed7a9559646c3b8e997ed1c514a.snippet:
## Statutory Maternity Pay

You can’t get SMP if you go into police custody during your maternity pay period. It won’t restart when you’re discharged.
clauses: You can’t get SMP if you go into police custody during your maternity pay period.
It won’t restart when you’re discharged.

edus: Apply to your local council for Council Tax Reduction
if you 're on a low income or benefits
- this has replaced Council Tax Benefit

clauses: Apply to your local council for Council Tax Reduction if you're on a low income or benefits - this has replaced Council Tax Benefit

edus: The Montgomery GI Bill
( MGIB )
is an educational assistance program
enacted by Congress
to attract high quality men
and women into the Armed Forces .
The MGIB-Active Duty program provides up to 36 months of education benefits to those
who have served on active duty .
395e049377c4b6d09a040239cfabd90a019d7c1f.snippet: The Montgomery GI Bill (MGIB) is an educational assistance program enacted by Congress to attract high quality men and women into the Armed Forces. The MGIB-Active Duty program provides up to 36 months of education benefits to those who have served on active duty.
clauses: The Montgomery GI Bill (MGIB) is an educational assistance program enacted by Congress to attract high quality men and women into the Armed Forces.
The MGIB-Active Duty program provides up to 36 months of education benefits to those who have served on active duty.

af015f11aa9ae8ff434e4c5d5bf9b02de8a1da08.title: #  Export products made from endangered animals: special rules
clauses: If animal is classed as Annex A, you must apply for an Article 10 certificate unless any of the following apply:
* your goods are antiques made before 1947
* you’re giving your goods away
* you’re using or displaying goods for non-commercial reasons like scientific research or in an educational display
af015f11aa9ae8ff434e4c5d5bf9b02de8a1da08.snippet:
#  Export products made from endangered animals: special rules

If animal is classed as Annex A, you must apply for an Article 10 certificate unless any of the following apply:

* your goods are antiques made before 1947
* you’re giving your goods away
* you’re using or displaying goods for non-commercial reasons like scientific research or in an educational display

edus: Child Car Seat Laws
clauses: Child Car Seat Laws

edus: Renters and homeowners alike may borrow up to $ 40,000
to replace damaged or destroyed personal property such as clothing , furniture , appliances , automobiles , etc .
As a rule of thumb , personal property is anything
that is not considered real estate or a part of the actual structure .
This loan may not be used replace extraordinarily expensive or irreplaceable items , such as antiques , collections , pleasure boats , recreational vehicles , fur coats , etc .
9181696eb905c30e76d94eddfc4d722393334e93.snippet: Renters and homeowners alike may borrow up to $40,000 to replace damaged or destroyed personal property such as clothing, furniture, appliances, automobiles, etc. As a rule of thumb, personal property is anything that is not considered real estate or a part of the actual structure. This loan may not be used replace extraordinarily expensive or irreplaceable items, such as antiques, collections, pleasure boats, recreational vehicles, fur coats, etc.
clauses: Renters and homeowners alike may borrow up to $40,000 to replace damaged or destroyed personal property such as clothing, furniture, appliances, automobiles, etc.
As a rule of thumb, personal property is anything that is not considered real estate or a part of the actual structure.
This loan may not be used replace extraordinarily expensive or irreplaceable items, such as antiques, collections, pleasure boats, recreational vehicles, fur coats, etc.

3e736618f875de698bb1014c687ea46902070cc4.title: ### Equipment for medical and veterinary use
clauses: You may also be able to zero-rate some other medical and veterinary equipment when you sell it to:
* charities that provide rescue or first aid services to humans or animals
* someone buying it specifically for donation to one of these bodies
3e736618f875de698bb1014c687ea46902070cc4.snippet:
### Equipment for medical and veterinary use

You may also be able to zero-rate some other medical and veterinary equipment when you sell it to:

* charities that provide rescue or first aid services to humans or animals
* someone buying it specifically for donation to one of these bodies

c741ce4d062f02a4f0f0dad4af6fcf45c25359ba.title: #  1. Overview
edus: You get the Additional State Pension automatically
if you ’ re eligible for it ,
unless you ’ ve contracted out of it .
c741ce4d062f02a4f0f0dad4af6fcf45c25359ba.snippet:
#  1. Overview

You get the Additional State Pension automatically if you’re eligible for it, unless you’ve contracted out of it.
clauses: You get the Additional State Pension automatically if you’re eligible for it, unless you’ve contracted out of it.
Person licensed to sell retail marijuana or retail marijuana products.
A person licensed to sell retail marijuana or retail marijuana products pursuant to this chapter may not:
* Display any signs that are inconsistent with local laws or regulations;
*  Use advertising material that is misleading, deceptive or false, or that is designed to appeal to a person under 21 years of age;
*  Have in that person's possession or upon the licensed premises any marijuana the sale of which is not permitted by the license;

435ecfcb3b812b165590a000a4748b6080761c05.title: ## If you act for a lot of clients
edus: Use form 64-8 to get authorisation
if you ’ re a paid agent .
You can then use the Agent Priority Line
to contact the Tax Credit Office .
435ecfcb3b812b165590a000a4748b6080761c05.snippet:
## If you act for a lot of clients

Use form 64-8 to get authorisation if you’re a paid agent. You can then use the Agent Priority Line to contact the Tax Credit Office.
clauses: Use form 64-8 to get authorisation if you’re a paid agent.
You can then use the Agent Priority Line to contact the Tax Credit Office.
* Buy, sell, transfer, give away or acquire retail marijuana or retail marijuana products.
f4a2ed2255d1249f22baa6fa348a47b5373ae33f.snippet: * Buy, sell, transfer, give away or acquire retail marijuana or retail marijuana products.

88556f63d7e24ced050ae922f6613fedc75437d2.title: ## Taking more leave than the entitlement
edus: If a worker has taken more leave
than they ’ re entitled to ,
their employer must not take money from their final pay
unless it ’ s been agreed beforehand in writing .
The rules in this situation should be outlined in the employment contract , company handbook or intranet site .
88556f63d7e24ced050ae922f6613fedc75437d2.snippet:
## Taking more leave than the entitlement

If a worker has taken more leave than they’re entitled to, their employer must not take money from their final pay unless it’s been agreed beforehand in writing. The rules in this situation should be outlined in the employment contract, company handbook or intranet site.
clauses: If a worker has taken more leave than they’re entitled to, their employer must not take money from their final pay unless it’s been agreed beforehand in writing.
The rules in this situation should be outlined in the employment contract, company handbook or intranet site.

if you expect to be away for one year or more .

Your tax credits will stop if you expect to be away for one year or more.

edus: All drivers ,
regardless of age or license status ,
are banned from texting
while behind the wheel .

c89f1a202759a9d0b56e826284f6f4da9ba5118e.title: ## File requirements
edus: Each attachment must be less than 10MB .
If it 's larger compress it or send it by post .
The blue bar above your attachments shows
the MB used per upload .
c89f1a202759a9d0b56e826284f6f4da9ba5118e.snippet:

Each attachment must be less than 10MB. If it's larger compress it or send it by post. The blue bar above your attachments shows the MB used per upload.

If it's larger compress it or send it by post.

77077a4e431ff3a0219f3eaac60660db147155ef.title: #  Export products made from endangered animals: special rules
edus: There are special rules for products
made with elephant ivory , rhino horn , tigers and their parts and derivatives , bear bile , bear paws and gallbladders , and eggs of native British birds .
They can only be exported in special cases like for scientific research ,
if they ’ re family heirlooms or valuable artworks .
77077a4e431ff3a0219f3eaac60660db147155ef.snippet:
#  Export products made from endangered animals: special rules

There are special rules for products made with elephant ivory, rhino horn, tigers and their parts and derivatives, bear bile, bear paws and gallbladders, and eggs of native British birds. They can only be exported in special cases like for scientific research, if they’re family heirlooms or valuable artworks.
clauses: There are special rules for products made with elephant ivory, rhino horn, tigers and their parts and derivatives, bear bile, bear paws and gallbladders, and eggs of native British birds.
They can only be exported in special cases like for scientific research, if they’re family heirlooms or valuable artworks.
You may be an eligible Veteran if:
* You have an Honorable Discharge, and
* You have a High School Diploma (or equivalent) - or 12 hours of college credit, and
* You meet the requirements under one of the four categories, listed on the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Montgomery GI Bill Active Duty page

edus: If you are a female Vietnam Veteran with a child
who has a birth defect
or you are a child of a female Vietnam Veteran with a birth defect ,
the child may be eligible for VA-financed health care .
95222ed436cbf83e71c65f1021aee2a7e7211313.snippet: If you are a female Vietnam Veteran with a child who has a birth defect or you are a child of a female Vietnam Veteran with a birth defect, the child may be eligible for VA-financed health care.

6d122da9b23390b95f675155ae6b45d7ad807eed.title: ## Age restrictions
edus: Patients under the age of 18 must have a designated provider .
Patients under the age of 21 can not participate in a cooperative garden or receive marijuana
that was produced ,
processed or delivered through a cooperative garden .
The patient ’ s designated provider may participate in a cooperative garden on behalf of the patient .
6d122da9b23390b95f675155ae6b45d7ad807eed.snippet:
## Age restrictions

Patients under the age of 18 must have a designated provider. Patients under the age of 21 cannot participate in a cooperative garden or receive marijuana that was produced, processed or delivered through a cooperative garden. The patient’s designated provider may participate in a cooperative garden on behalf of the patient.
clauses: Patients under the age of 18 must have a designated provider.
Patients under the age of 21 cannot participate in a cooperative garden or receive marijuana that was produced, processed or delivered through a cooperative garden.
The patient’s designated provider may participate in a cooperative garden on behalf of the patient.

a634482fe83dc8cd441801406e7b0127fa474d09.title: ## State Pension top up
edus: If you topped up your State Pension
( between 12 October 2015 and 5 April 2017 ) ,
your spouse or civil partner may be able to inherit some or all of your top up .
a634482fe83dc8cd441801406e7b0127fa474d09.snippet:
## State Pension top up

If you topped up your State Pension (between 12 October 2015 and 5 April 2017), your spouse or civil partner may be able to inherit some or all of your top up.
clauses: If you topped up your State Pension (between 12 October 2015 and 5 April 2017), your spouse or civil partner may be able to inherit some or all of your top up.

you don ’ t need to do anything .

67f699301c8582772ccaa01f49e56359283fc62c.title: #  2. Authorisation
edus: You must be authorised to talk to the Tax Credit Office about someone else ’ s tax credits .
If you ’ re not ,
every time you call
that person must first confirm their identity
and say
they ’ re happy for you to act for them .
67f699301c8582772ccaa01f49e56359283fc62c.snippet:
#  2. Authorisation

You must be authorised to talk to the Tax Credit Office about someone else’s tax credits. If you’re not, every time you call that person must first confirm their identity and say they’re happy for you to act for them.
clauses: You must be authorised to talk to the Tax Credit Office about someone else’s tax credits.
If you’re not, every time you call that person must first confirm their identity and say they’re happy for you to act for them.

edus: Homeowners may apply for up to $ 200,000 to repair
or replace their primary residence to its pre-disaster condition .
The loan may not be used
to upgrade the home
or make additions to it ,
unless as required by building authority/code .
In some cases , SBA may be able to refinance all or part of a previous mortgage
( not to exceed $ 200,000 )
when the applicant does not have credit available elsewhere ,
has suffered substantial disaster damage
not covered by insurance ,
and intends to repair the damage .
SBA considers refinancing
when processing each application .
Loans may also be increased by as much as 20 percent of the verified losses
( not to exceed $ 200,000 )
to protect the damaged real property from possible future disasters of the same kind .
Secondary homes or vacation properties are not eligible for home disaster loans ;
however , qualified rental properties may be eligible for assistance under the business disaster loan program .
3df8c26a7f51f322c208b1be1dada20b92f10c76.snippet: Homeowners may apply for up to $200,000 to repair or replace their primary residence to its pre-disaster condition. The loan may not be used to upgrade the home or make additions to it, unless as required by building authority/code. In some cases, SBA may be able to refinance all or part of a previous mortgage (not to exceed $200,000) when the applicant does not have credit available elsewhere, has suffered substantial disaster damage not covered by insurance, and intends to repair the damage. SBA considers refinancing when processing each application. Loans may also be increased by as much as 20 percent of the verified losses (not to exceed $200,000) to protect the damaged real property from possible future disasters of the same kind. Secondary homes or vacation properties are not eligible for home disaster loans; however, qualified rental properties may be eligible for assistance under the business disaster loan program.
clauses: Homeowners may apply for up to $200,000 to repair or replace their primary residence to its pre-disaster condition.
The loan may not be used to upgrade the home or make additions to it, unless as required by building authority/code.

In some cases, SBA may be able to refinance all or part of a previous mortgage (not to exceed $200,000) when the applicant does not have credit available elsewhere, has suffered substantial disaster damage not covered by insurance, and intends to repair the damage.
SBA considers refinancing when processing each application.
Loans may also be increased by as much as 20 percent of the verified losses (not to exceed $200,000) to protect the damaged real property from possible future disasters of the same kind.
Secondary homes or vacation properties are not eligible for home disaster loans; however, qualified rental properties may be eligible for assistance under the business disaster loan program.

b567078c5986d40efaeeebb008763f7d258a4a7b.title: ## Patient Information
edus: Healthcare practitioners may authorize the use of marijuana for any patient
as long as it 's medically appropriate under the law and the profession ’ s standard of care .
The Department of Health does n't keep a list of those specific practitioners
that are authorizing ,
however there is a list of healthcare practitioners
that are allowed to authorize marijuana for medical marijuana .
b567078c5986d40efaeeebb008763f7d258a4a7b.snippet:
## Patient Information

Healthcare practitioners may authorize the use of marijuana for any patient as long as it's medically appropriate under the law and the profession’s standard of care. The Department of Health doesn't keep a list of those specific practitioners that are authorizing, however there is a list of healthcare practitioners that are allowed to authorize marijuana for medical marijuana.
clauses: Healthcare practitioners may authorize the use of marijuana for any patient as long as it's medically appropriate under the law and the profession’s standard of care.

The Department of Health doesn't keep a list of those specific practitioners that are authorizing, however there is a list of healthcare practitioners that are allowed to authorize marijuana for medical marijuana.

879f8f07a2a479b1bc61760b2f62b73a973f52f4.title: #  1. Overview
clauses: The Additional State Pension is an extra amount of money you could get on top of your basic State Pension if you’re:
* a man born before 6 April 1951
* a woman born before 6 April 1953
879f8f07a2a479b1bc61760b2f62b73a973f52f4.snippet:
#  1. Overview

The Additional State Pension is an extra amount of money you could get on top of your basic State Pension if you’re:

* a man born before 6 April 1951
* a woman born before 6 April 1953

a99e2fe2f6b849dda4ec5ce89679531c8d2f0e1d.title: #  4. Tax when you live abroad
edus: If you ’ re not a UK resident ,
you don ’ t usually pay UK tax on your pension .
But you might have to pay tax in the country you live in .
There are a few exceptions - for example ,
UK civil service pensions will always be taxed in the UK .
a99e2fe2f6b849dda4ec5ce89679531c8d2f0e1d.snippet:
#  4. Tax when you live abroad

If you’re not a UK resident, you don’t usually pay UK tax on your pension. But you might have to pay tax in the country you live in. There are a few exceptions - for example, UK civil service pensions will always be taxed in the UK.
clauses: If you’re not a UK resident, you don’t usually pay UK tax on your pension.
But you might have to pay tax in the country you live in.
There are a few exceptions - for example, UK civil service pensions will always be taxed in the UK.

31dde373d35ad47dfc52f6c41a8ae47a8217804c.title: #  Export products made from endangered animals: special rules
edus: If Species+ says
the animal is banned ,
you can ’ t export the product .
There are special rules for ivory , rhino horn and certain other animal products .
31dde373d35ad47dfc52f6c41a8ae47a8217804c.snippet:
#  Export products made from endangered animals: special rules

If Species+ says the animal is banned, you can’t export the product. There are special rules for ivory, rhino horn and certain other animal products.
clauses: If Species+ says the animal is banned, you can’t export the product.
There are special rules for ivory, rhino horn and certain other animal products.

12c6078ef968d7be91a1f43dc0a3d61eda3386a3.title: ##Who May Receive a Grant?
edus: Contrary to what you might see online or in the media ,
the federal government does not offer grants or “ free money ” to individuals
to start a business ,
or cover personal expenses .
12c6078ef968d7be91a1f43dc0a3d61eda3386a3.snippet:
##Who May Receive a Grant?

Contrary to what you might see online or in the media, the federal government does not offer grants or “free money” to individuals to start a business, or cover personal expenses.
clauses: Contrary to what you might see online or in the media, the federal government does not offer grants or “free money” to individuals to start a business, or cover personal expenses.
